# Dominican Republic women's national under-15 and under-16 basketball team

Bronze: 2 (2009, 2022)
}}
The '''Dominican Republic women's national under-15 and under-16 basketball team''' is a national basketball team of the Dominican Republic, administered by the Federaci√≥n Dominicana de Baloncesto. It represents the country in international under-15 and under-16 women's basketball competitions.
